new.subject: new participant
new.html: A new participant joined with number:<font color="blue">[number]</font> and ip:<font color="blue">[Ip]</font> on <font color="blue">[date] [timeZone]</font>

invalidNumber.subject: invalid Number
invalidNumber.html: A new participant tried to register with an invalid number:<font color="blue">[number]</font> from ip:<font color="blue">[Ip]</font> on <font color="blue">[date] [timeZone]</font>

wrongDynIpPin.subject: wrong dynIp pin
wrongDynIpPin.html: <font color="blue">[Ip]</font> tried to update the dynIp for <font color="blue">[number]</font>(<font color="blue">[name]</font>) with a wrong pin for the <font color="blue">[counter].</font> time on <font color="blue">[date] [timeZone]</font>

wrongDynIpType.subject: wrong dynIp type
wrongDynIpType.html: <font color="blue">[Ip]</font> tried to update the dynIp for <font color="blue">[number]</font>(<font color="blue">[name]</font>), which does not support dynIp(is type <font color="blue">[type]</font>) on <font color="blue">[date] [timeZone]</font>

wrongServerPin.subject: wrong Server pin
wrongServerPin.html: <font color="blue">[Ip]</font> tried to syncronize with the server with a wrong pin on <font color="blue">[date] [timeZone]</font>

ipV6DynIpUpdate.subject: ipv6 DynIp update
ipV6DynIpUpdate.html: <font color="blue">[Ip]</font> tried to update the dynIp for <font color="blue">[number]</font>(<font color="blue">[name]</font>) with an ipv6 address on <font color="blue">[date] [timeZone]</font>

ServerError.subject: Could not connect to server
ServerError.html: Could not connect to server: <font color="blue">[host]:[port]</font>. Error counter: <font color="blue">[errorCounter]</font> Error code: <font color="blue">[lastError]</font> on <font color="blue">[date] [timeZone]</font>

ServerErrorOver.subject: Server could be reached again
ServerErrorOver.html: Could connect to server: <font color="blue">[host]:[port]</font> again on <font color="blue">[date] [timeZone]</font>. Error counter was at: <font color="blue">[errorCounter]</font>
